geoQuery.query: select a.id, a.wkb_geometry, a.mi_style "type" from flow_chart.tr_mapshem_county a order by id
SELECT a.ID, a.WKB_GEOMETRY, a.MI_STYLE "TYPE" FROM FLOW_CHART.TR_MAPSHEM_GIS a ORDER BY ID

WITH t AS (SELECT ID ,substr(REPLACE(MI_STYLE, ' ',''),length(REPLACE(MI_STYLE, ' ','')) - strpos(reverse(REPLACE(MI_STYLE, ' ','')),',')+2,length(REPLACE(MI_STYLE, ' ',''))-(length(REPLACE(MI_STYLE, ' ','')) - strpos(reverse(REPLACE(MI_STYLE, ' ','')),',')+2))::integer orient ,WKB_GEOMETRY ,REPLACE(MI_STYLE, ' ','') MI_STYLE ,REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTR(REPLACE(MI_STYLE, ' ',''),1,length(REPLACE(MI_STYLE, ' ','')) - strpos(reverse(REPLACE(MI_STYLE, ' ','')),',')+1),'Symbol(54','Symbol(53'),'Symbol(51','Symbol(53') translated FROM FLOW_CHART.TR_MAPSHEM_GRS) SELECT ID ,WKB_GEOMETRY ,CASE WHEN orient >-22 AND orient < 22 THEN translated||'0'||')' WHEN orient >21 AND orient < 67 THEN translated||'45'||')' WHEN orient >66 AND orient < 112 THEN translated||'90'||')' WHEN orient >111 AND orient < 157 THEN translated||'135'||')' WHEN orient >156 AND orient < 202 THEN translated||'180'||')' WHEN orient >201 AND orient < 247 THEN translated||'225'||')' WHEN orient >246 AND orient < 292 THEN translated||'270'||')' WHEN orient >292 AND orient < 340 THEN translated||'315'||')' WHEN orient >339 AND orient < 0 THEN translated||'0'||')' WHEN orient >201-360 AND orient < 247-360 THEN translated||'225'||')' WHEN orient >246-360 AND orient < 292-360 THEN translated||'270'||')' WHEN orient >292-360 AND orient < 340-360 THEN translated||'315'||')' ELSE MI_STYLE end "TYPE" FROM t ORDER BY ID
SELECT a.ID, a.WKB_GEOMETRY, a.MI_STYLE "TYPE" FROM FLOW_CHART.TR_MAPSHEM_PTG a WHERE {FILTER} ORDER BY ID

SELECT a.ID, a.WKB_GEOMETRY, CASE WHEN a.MI_STYLE LIKE '%Font%' THEN SUBSTR (a.MI_STYLE,strpos (a.MI_STYLE, 'F')) ELSE a.MI_STYLE END "TYPE", a.mif_text "LABEL" FROM FLOW_CHART.TR_MAPSHEM_ROAD a ORDER BY ID

SELECT ID, WKB_GEOMETRY, CASE WHEN MI_STYLE LIKE '%Font%' THEN SUBSTR (SUBSTR (MI_STYLE,strpos(MI_STYLE, 'F')), 0, strpos(SUBSTR(MI_STYLE,strpos(MI_STYLE, 'F')), ')'))||')' ELSE MI_STYLE END "TYPE", mif_text "LABEL" FROM FLOW_CHART.TR_MAPSHEM_TEXT where mi_style like '%Font ("Times New Roman CYR",0,0,0)%'

WITH t AS (SELECT ID ,CASE WHEN upper(MI_STYLE) LIKE 'SYMBOL%' THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(MI_STYLE, ' ',''), length(REPLACE(MI_STYLE, ' ','')) - strpos(reverse(REPLACE(MI_STYLE, ' ','')),',')+2,length(REPLACE(MI_STYLE, ' ',''))-(length(REPLACE(MI_STYLE, ' ','')) - strpos(reverse(REPLACE(MI_STYLE, ' ','')),',')+2))::integer ELSE NULL END ORIENT ,REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTR(REPLACE(MI_STYLE, ' ',''),1,length(REPLACE(MI_STYLE, ' ','')) - strpos(reverse(REPLACE(MI_STYLE, ' ','')),',')+1),'Symbol(54','Symbol(53'),'Symbol(51','Symbol(53') translated ,WKB_GEOMETRY ,mi_Style ,mif_text FROM FLOW_CHART.TR_MAPSHEM_WATERWAY ) SELECT ID, WKB_GEOMETRY ,CASE WHEN upper(MI_STYLE) LIKE 'SYMBOL%' THEN CASE WHEN orient>-22 AND orient<22 THEN translated||'0'||')' WHEN orient>21 AND orient<67 THEN translated||'45'||')' WHEN orient>66 AND orient<112 THEN translated||'90'||')' WHEN orient>111 AND orient<157 THEN translated||'135'||')' WHEN orient>156 AND orient<202 THEN translated||'180'||')' WHEN orient>201 AND orient<247 THEN translated||'225'||')' WHEN orient>246 AND orient<292 THEN translated||'270'||')' WHEN orient>292 AND orient<340 THEN translated||'315'||')' WHEN orient>339 AND orient<0 THEN translated||'0'||')' WHEN orient>135-360 AND orient<201-360 THEN translated||'180'||')' WHEN orient>201-360 AND orient<247-360 THEN translated||'225'||')' WHEN orient>246-360 AND orient<292-360 THEN translated||'270'||')' WHEN orient>292-360 AND orient<340-360 THEN translated||'315'||')' ELSE REPLACE(MI_STYLE, ' ','') END WHEN upper(MI_STYLE) LIKE '%FONT%' THEN SUBSTR (MI_STYLE,strpos (MI_STYLE, 'F')) ELSE REPLACE(MI_STYLE, ' ','') END "TYPE" , mif_text "LABEL" FROM t ORDER BY ID

WITH route_part_info as ( select * from ( select sb.station station_begin,se.station station_end,sb.route_id,c.*, rank() over (partition by sb.route_id,sb.station,se.station order by ii.begin_date,e.create_date desc) n from pods.event_range e,pods.station_point sb,pods.station_point se,pods.sto_ili_inspection_calc c, pods.ili_inspection ii where e.event_id=c.event_id and c.type_cl like 'Оценка состояния по межконструкционным участкам' and e.station_id_begin=sb.station_id and e.station_id_end=se.station_id and ii.ili_inspection_id=c.ili_inspection_id) d where n=1), route_part_info_otv as ( select * from ( select sb.station station_begin,se.station station_end,sb.route_id,c.*, rank() over (partition by sb.route_id,sb.station,se.station order by ii.begin_date,e.create_date desc) n from pods.event_range e,pods.station_point sb,pods.station_point se,pods.sto_ili_inspection_calc c, pods.ili_inspection ii,pods.route r where e.event_id=c.event_id and c.type_cl like 'Оценка состояния по линейному event-объекту' and e.station_id_begin=sb.station_id and e.station_id_end=se.station_id and ii.ili_inspection_id=c.ili_inspection_id and r.route_id=sb.route_id and r.type_cl not like '%10' ) d where n=1) select r.id, CASE WHEN coalesce(i.STO_292_2007_VALUE_CONDITION,0) <= 0.03 THEN 'vas5_line' WHEN coalesce(i.STO_292_2007_VALUE_CONDITION,0) > 0.03 AND coalesce(i.STO_292_2007_VALUE_CONDITION,0) <= 0.06 THEN 'vas6_line' WHEN coalesce(i.STO_292_2007_VALUE_CONDITION,0) <= 0.3 AND coalesce(i.STO_292_2007_VALUE_CONDITION,0) > 0.06 THEN 'vas7_line' WHEN coalesce(i.STO_292_2007_VALUE_CONDITION,0) > 0.3 THEN 'vas8_line' ELSE 'vas_unk' END "TYPE", round(coalesce(i.STO_292_2007_VALUE_CONDITION,0),3) "label", r.wkb_geometry from flow_chart.wkb_tr_mapshem_route_part r join route_part_info i on i.route_id=r.route_id and abs(i.station_begin-r.station_begin)<0.3 and abs(i.station_end-r.station_end)<0.3 and r.station_begin>-1 union ALL select r.id, CASE WHEN coalesce(i.STO_292_2007_VALUE_CONDITION,0) <= 0.03 THEN 'vas5_line' WHEN coalesce(i.STO_292_2007_VALUE_CONDITION,0) <= 0.06 AND coalesce(i.STO_292_2007_VALUE_CONDITION,0) > 0.03 THEN 'vas6_line' WHEN coalesce(i.STO_292_2007_VALUE_CONDITION,0) <= 0.3 AND coalesce(i.STO_292_2007_VALUE_CONDITION,0) > 0.06 THEN 'vas7_line' WHEN coalesce(i.STO_292_2007_VALUE_CONDITION,0) > 0.3 THEN 'vas8_line' ELSE 'vas_unk' END "TYPE", round(coalesce(i.STO_292_2007_VALUE_CONDITION,0),3) "label", r.wkb_geometry from flow_chart.wkb_tr_mapshem_route_part r join route_part_info_otv i on i.route_id=r.route_id and r.station_begin=-1

select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (order BY id) id, id semantic_id, "TYPE", "label", wkb_geometry, station_begin from (select p.id, p.type_id "TYPE", coalesce(to_char(p.date_begin,'DD.MM.YY'),'НД')||'-'||coalesce(to_char(p.date_end,'DD.MM.YY'),'НД') "label", rp.wkb_geometry, p.station_begin,p.date_begin from flow_chart.kap_remont_plan p,pods.route r,pods.line l,flow_chart.wkb_tr_mapshem_route_part rp where p.station_begin is not null and l.description=p.line_description and r.line_id=l.line_id and rp.route_id=r.route_id and rp.station_begin>=p.station_begin-0.1 and rp.station_end<=p.station_end+0.1 union all select p.id, p.type_id "TYPE", coalesce(to_char(p.date_begin,'DD.MM.YY'),'НД')||'-'||coalesce(to_char(p.date_end,'DD.MM.YY'),'НД') "label", rp.wkb_geometry, p.station_begin,p.date_begin from flow_chart.kap_remont_plan p,pods.route r,pods.line l,flow_chart.wkb_tr_mapshem_route_part rp where p.station_begin is not null and l.description=p.line_description and r.line_id=l.line_id and rp.route_id=r.route_id and rp.station_begin<=p.station_begin and rp.station_end>=p.station_end and p.id not in (select p.id from flow_chart.kap_remont_plan p,pods.route r,pods.line l,flow_chart.wkb_tr_mapshem_route_part rp where p.station_begin is not null and l.description=p.line_description and r.line_id=l.line_id and rp.route_id=r.route_id and rp.station_begin>=p.station_begin-0.1 and rp.station_end<=p.station_end+0.1) union all select p.id, p.type_id "TYPE", coalesce(to_char(p.date_begin,'DD.MM.YY'),'НД')||'-'||coalesce(to_char(p.date_end,'DD.MM.YY'),'НД') "label", rp.wkb_geometry, p.station_begin,p.date_begin from flow_chart.kap_remont_plan p,pods.route r,pods.line l,flow_chart.wkb_tr_mapshem_route_part rp where l.description=p.line_description and r.line_id=l.line_id and rp.route_id=r.route_id and r.type_cl like '%04' union ALL select p.id, p.type_id "TYPE", coalesce(to_char(p.date_begin,'DD.MM.YY'),'НД')||'-'||coalesce(to_char(p.date_end,'DD.MM.YY'),'НД') "label", dp.wkb_geometry, p.station_begin,p.date_begin from flow_chart.kap_remont_plan p,flow_chart.wkb_tr_mapshem_ks_department dp where p.object_name=dp.object_name) dd where {FILTER} order by dd.date_begin

SELECT ID, WKB_GEOMETRY, CASE WHEN MI_STYLE LIKE '%Font%' THEN SUBSTR (SUBSTR (MI_STYLE,strpos(MI_STYLE, 'F')), 0, strpos(SUBSTR(MI_STYLE,strpos(MI_STYLE, 'F')), ')'))||')' ELSE MI_STYLE END "TYPE", mif_text "LABEL" FROM FLOW_CHART.TR_MAPSHEM_TEXT where mi_style like '%Font ("Times New Roman CYR",0,0,0)%'

SELECT ID, WKB_GEOMETRY, CASE WHEN MI_STYLE LIKE '%Font%' THEN SUBSTR (SUBSTR (MI_STYLE,strpos(MI_STYLE, 'F')), 0, strpos(SUBSTR(MI_STYLE,strpos(MI_STYLE, 'F')), ')'))||')' ELSE MI_STYLE END "TYPE", mif_text "LABEL" FROM FLOW_CHART.TR_MAPSHEM_TEXT where mi_style not like '%Font ("Times New Roman CYR",0,0,0)%' ORDER BY ID
